summary: This module implements the logic for pushing DVC experiment references and their cached data to a remote repository. It resolves experiment names or revisions into references, uploads the necessary Git objects and cache files, groups the outcomes, and can notify DVC Studio about the new experiment references. It also defines a custom error type for upload failures.
business_intent: Enable users to share and synchronize their machine learning experiment results across team members and cloud services by pushing experiment metadata and artifacts to a remote DVC storage and updating DVC Studio.
